trait.name: Age
trait.text: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens. Most human initiates have completed the trials and found a glorious or inglorious death before they turn 30. Viziers can enjoy longer service to their gods, in theory living up to a century.

trait.name: Alignment
trait.text: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

trait.name: Skills
trait.text: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

trait.name: Feat
trait.text: You gain one feat of your choice.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.
